other_tests.findings: Moderate mixed hearing loss bilaterally: air and bone conduction at 2000 Hz was 50 and 35, respectively, for both ears.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subject fitted with hearing aids at age 9 months.
Improved with increased /H9252-blockers and calorie intake.

other_tests.findings: IQ score was 61, height at 92.2 cm, weight at 13 kg.
Serum concentrations: FT4 was greater than 6.0 ng/dl, FT3 was greater than 30 pg/ml, TSH was 14.4 mU/liter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Dose of TRIAC was doubled after 1 year.

other_tests.findings: Pathological diagnosis was diffuse adenomatous hyperplasia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Growth was delayed, with height and weight below the 3rd centile.

other_tests.date: At 11 yr and 7 months of age
other_tests.findings: Verbal IQ score was 49, performance IQ score was 55, total IQ score was 50.

other_tests.date: At 9 yr and 6 months of age
other_tests.findings: Verbal IQ score was 49, performance IQ score was 50, total IQ score was 46.
